name: getNetworkFirmwareUpgrades
description: Get firmware upgrade information for a network

$ul: **products**: The network devices to be updated
**appliance**: The network device to be updated
**availableVersions**: Firmware versions available for upgrade
**currentVersion**: Details of the current version on the device
**firmware**: Name of the firmware version
**id**: Firmware version identifier
**releaseDate**: Release date of the firmware version
**releaseType**: Release type of the firmware version
**shortName**: Firmware version short name
**lastUpgrade**: Details of the last firmware upgrade on the device
**fromVersion**: Details of the version the device upgraded from
**firmware**: Name of the firmware version
**id**: Firmware version identifier
**releaseDate**: Release date of the firmware version
**releaseType**: Release type of the firmware version
**shortName**: Firmware version short name
**time**: Timestamp of the last successful firmware upgrade
**toVersion**: Details of the version the device upgraded to
**firmware**: Name of the firmware version
**id**: Firmware version identifier
**releaseDate**: Release date of the firmware version
**releaseType**: Release type of the firmware version
**shortName**: Firmware version short name
**nextUpgrade**: Details of the next firmware upgrade on the device
**time**: Timestamp of the next scheduled firmware upgrade
**toVersion**: Details of the version the device will upgrade to if it exists
**firmware**: Name of the firmware version
**id**: Firmware version identifier
**releaseDate**: Release date of the firmware version
**releaseType**: Release type of the firmware version
**shortName**: Firmware version short name
**participateInNextBetaRelease**: Whether or not the network wants beta firmware
